code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pagination=_ref=>{let{currentPage,pageSize,totalItems,onPageChange,onPageSizeChange}=_ref;const totalPages=Math.ceil(totalItems/pageSize);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pagination",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onPageChange(currentPage-1),disabled:currentPage===1,children:"Previous"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Page ",currentPage," of ",totalPages]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onPageChange(currentPage+1),disabled:currentPage===totalPages,children:"Next"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:pageSize,onChange:e=>onPageSizeChange(Number(e.target.value)),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:10,children:"10"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:20,children:"20"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:50,children:"50"})]})]});};export default Pagination;
